website_summaries.verdict: A very affordable nursing cover and scarf that covers a large area.
pros: Made of a soft, blended cotton fabric
Can be used as a scarf or a nursing cover
cons: It is very big and hard to adjust and/or get to stay on

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I live on an island that is hot and humid year round and it makes it hard to try to breastfeed my son when its hot. And I wear t-shirts everyday so when I'm out in public and have a regular nursing cover all my side and back shows not cool. But with this nursing cover I don't have to worry about it its thin not see through easy to use and it's very convient to have. I live this nursing cover.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: 1-The pic is deceiving , the pic looks like a nice drapey jersey kmit fabric but it's actually a woven fabric ,same pattern no stretch and dull. 2 -Because it has no stretch it's awkward when placed around you and can be slightly restricting 3 - the different ways of folding or "wearing"this piece won't really work. Im keeping it because the price was ok and i can make it work until i find the concept I want.
customer_reviews.author: KEW

customer_reviews.title: simple, just what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the most simple BF cover and this is GREAT! the price is amazing. I don't know why some are $30. Blows my mind. I couldn't believe I got this for a little over $6. It is comfortable and works really well. It is not bulky and I can just throw it in my diaper bag. I like that I can see my baby while feeding him in it. I don't like the ones that go around your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Very big
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice nursing scarf and works well. I didn’t like how large it was. There’s so much extra fabric making it hard to keep on. It’s not a stretchy material. You cannot use it as a car seat cover because it’s too big. It doesn’t work well over the shoulder like the picture. I find best luck by wearing it like a necklace and spreading the fabric out over baby and my to nurse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much help
customer_reviews.text: First off, this would be easy to make yourself. It's just a giant strip of T-shirt material sewn at both ends. I found the holes to be too large to serve any purpose. I was using a muslin blanket as a cover, but didn't want to have to worry about baby pulling it off of me when she gets bigger. The holes on this cover are so large that I'll have the same issue. I also don't see how it can be worn as a shawl or scarf because it just slides off my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Slight disappointment for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover because I wanted something that would cover my back and not just the front since I didn't want to always have to be wearing a cami under everything. There is plenty of fabric and it provides great coverage to keep me comfortable. The only thing I don't like about it is that it's a little awkward to maneuver when I am in the middle of nursing and need to see in. While I like this product and am glad to have it, I find it overpriced for what it is. If you're handy with a sewing machine you can make this for a few bucks and it will be just as good.
customer_reviews.author: CLR

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: It's a huge, flimsy circus tent. It drapes over you and baby but there's so much extra fabric is falls off. So it takes more work to hold this thing on - which is miserable when you're already having to using both hands to hold baby and nurse. To get something like this, just head to a fabric store, cut the desired length, and sew the ends together.
customer_reviews.author: Kim R

customer_reviews.title: Every parent should have one of these for babys or todlers.
customer_reviews.text: Love this scarf its perfect for my child still nursing she is 2yrs still trying ween but shes a brat. I use it when im at families and its nap time or if she gets hurt she finds comfort with this nursing scarf i also use it as a blanket when shes in the stroler or a cover to block the light when she falls asleep in the stroller or if her sweaters are in the car and i dont have anything small. Every mother should have one even if she isnt nursing wish i had one when i had my twins nine years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Krazyvet

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this non stop!! I’ve used while shopping, apple picking, local harvest fest, and covering up while pumping in my car and I LOVE IT!! My baby nor I ever got hot with this on! This includes me wearing it as a scarf, nursing him, baby wearing and using this as a scarf or pumping in my car!! This cover is fantastic!! Oh I almost forgot i did use this as a cover over his carseat and it worked great too!!
customer_reviews.author: Mizladi

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisified as a First Time/Breastfeeding Mom
customer_reviews.text: I am exclusivley breastfeeding my almost 8 week old and for the first time I managed to successfully breastfeed in public and with the help of this Scarf/Nursing Cover! It is super light weight, and breathable material; it is has plenty of material to work with and I never once became exposed even when trying to get my little one latched on. It is also convenient because when I am done, I just twist it up into an infinity scarf and go about our day. Highly reccomend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jacklynn Craft

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy fabric
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape and size of this nursing cover up & it fits perfectly as an infinity scarf even if I weren’t nursing, BUT, this thing is soooo scratchy & cheapo polyestery feeling. I chose this one over other brands to save a few bucks, but I can hardly stand the feeling of it against my skin. I’ll probably end up donating it & spending more than I would’ve if i’d just bought a higher quality cotton one in the first place. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F

customer_reviews.title: didn't work well for me
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't use this Anymore. It doesn't allow me to see my baby latching on, and was cumbersome to use as a nursing cover before we had both figured nursing out. Used it as a car seat cover for a long time, but we don't need it for that anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says, but would be easy to make
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what it says and will work fine. The only thing I wish I knew before purchasing is how easy it would be to make this. It is literally one piece of fabric with each end sewn together to make a circle. If I knew that's all it was I would have purchased a printed fabric and made it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great but the reality is that it needs a lot of improvement for it to work well as a nursing scarf/cover. I can not use this while feeding because I am way to exposed. I am 5"1 , 135 lbs. The cover either falls down completely while feeding or the opening on one side completely exposes my breasts. I will not be able to use this in public and it is just more of a hindrance. I prefer my nursing apron to this anyday.
customer_reviews.author: N.Mel

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my scarf last week. It's light and that was the main concern bc I'll definitely need it during the warm months. I like how it's open son the baby isn't completely covered & has room to move around. It's covers as littlenor as much as you want covered. I definitely recommend this. Chic & gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Yazzy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and is way cuter than the apron-like nursing covers I've seen in the past. It fits easily into the diaper bag without taking up too much space, and is easy to get on with one hand when baby is hungry and you don't have help. I have used it 90 degree weather, and it was still cool enough underneath that baby was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa H

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my wife as we are expecting ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wife as we are expecting out second child. With our first child she used a cover that just had a strap around the neck and as our daughter got bigger and more fidgety it was harder to keep covered in public. This time around the wanted something with more coverage and she came across this scarf. It is very soft and and fashionable and she is very excited to use it when the new baby comes in Feb.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Material
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this nursing scarf. It's very soft but breathable. My first child had me sweating under my previous nursing cover, but this one doesn't. I've used it even as a makeshift sling, a blanket and I love that it covers one shoulder and you're good to go. Lovely purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Made me feel comfortable and confident!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier! Liked it so much i got one for my sister too! I'm 140lbs and baby and I have plenty of room to maneuver without being exposed! It covers all of me and baby and is very useful for other needs too! (so far mine has been a scarf, pillow, blanket, hat, nursing cover and sun shield) The width allows for complete torso and baby coverage, for the first time I felt comfortable enough to feed my baby in a mall food court. The fabric's extremely soft and breathable, yet heavy enough to stay put when in use! Worth every penny! Thank you for making a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sma

customer_reviews.title: Not for small people!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it was too big. It was so hard trying to breastfeed with it being so big. It was always a big hassle for me trying to get my baby to latch on and then trying for this to not fall off and expose my baby and me. I wouldn't recommend it to small people.
customer_reviews.author: Llesica

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this scarf!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this nursing scarf. My child isn't here quite yet and I've already worn this scarf a bunch of times. I bought the grey - it matches everything and is super soft and comfortable! I usually don't like the infirmity scarf style but this one doesn't bunch up right against your neck, it's long enough that it hangs nicely in front of your chest! And bonus I got some awesome reusable breast pads! Thank you so much for putting out such a wonderful product! Will be excited to use it for breastfeeding when my second bundle of joy arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I use this mostly as a wearable blanket, in addition to a nursing blanket I have a premie, and I love that I can easily cover or uncover his face, depending on where we are walking It keeps his hands covered too. It’s so easy to slide him in hammock style and keep him covered. I also love the light breathable fabric. It’s summer and hot out, and I can cover my baby without overheating him I hang the blanket across my shoulders. No more accidentally dropping a blanket on the floor when repositioning baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 Stars - pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros and cons. Love that it is lightweight so baby doesn't get too hot under it. There's a ton of extra fabric so it takes a little bit more maneuvering and handling to keep everything covered. Yet I still prefer this to the cover I had before which was basically a blanket with a strap that went around my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price it isn't terrible. It's a bit thinner than I had hoped for, hoping for it to not be see through. I am a plus size woman, like 3X or 24/26 at the moment while very pregnant and this still fits me fairly comfortably. I really like the gray and the material seems reasonably sofy, I imagine after a good wash and hang dry it may be even softer.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Scarf and Nursing Cover- Win Win
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want anything fancy or too obvious as a nursing cover and this seemed like it would do the job and it does. The only issue I have is that I don't really like nursing in public so I don't use it that often, but I like knowing I have it just in case and that even if I don't use it that often, I can always use it as a scarf, so win win. It's a nice weight fabric, not too heavy or thin, and washes well. I got the gray color. Great price and great product. You really don't need anything more as a nursing cover.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service!
customer_reviews.text: Someone reached out and asked how it was going and then responded to my email with detail that’s very rare. They care about their customer. I also LOVE the quality of the scarf and can’t wait to use it next month. Will be buying more to match my outfits and as gifts for friends!
customer_reviews.author: Dita

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so far. It is as great as advertised. I plan on using to cover myself during breastfeeding/ wear it as a scarf/ and cover my son while he is in his car seat. Only negative is that it is very thin. I would of liked it to be just a bit thicker
customer_reviews.author: LonLonLo

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay put
customer_reviews.text: Could not figured out how to use this for breastfeeding the many other ways it works for baby. They sent a leaflet with out instructions that only highlights the the other uses but not how to implement them. Also it did not stay on when dropped for breastfeeding. Would've have loved to return it but missed the return date :(
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Easy Breazy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every single type of nursing cover out there and this cover has surpassed my hopes of finding a decent cover. I am nursing twins and have been trying to find a cover that I feel comfortable in. Finding a nursing cover that covers me all the way around has been hard to find until this one! I feel so comfortable and the material is incredibly breathable so my babes are comfortable as well. Makes for an easy breazy nursing sesh!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth double what they charge.... At least!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Let me start by saying the material is soooo soft and its big too. I know that it will cover me up when i need it. Its lightweight enough to wear around the neck in the winter of Florida lol and I can wear it other ways during other seasons. And the price.... Worth every penny. Heck I would pay double for this amazing product! Awesome! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kayla V.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and versitile!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the grey nursing cover and it looks exactly like the picture. I still have to learn how to tweak it so it doesn't look frumpy, but I love that it is a step away from the traditional "blanket" type nursing cover. The material is soft, stretchy and thin enough to keep baby covered but not smothered. I'm looking forward to testing it out once baby is here!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for nursing
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for nursing. It's easy stylish and portable. I also use it as a blanket for my little one so I don't have to carry extra things in my bag. Wish I had one with my first. Definitely would be an awesome gift. A must-have
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: The most helpful nursing cover. During summer its little warm inside for the baby.. best for winters. Using it for the past 6 months. Overall the best coverage and easy usage anywhere anytime. Washed and still it looks the same.
customer_reviews.author: Shiny

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about a nursing cover since I'm plus size. This worked perfectly. It fits fine and my baby doesn't hate it like he does other covers. The fabric is lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, highly versatile
customer_reviews.text: This has been a complete necessity for nursing on the go. I have an almost 5 year old and a new baby, meaning I'm still constantly on the go. This scarf/ nursing cover is soft, cute, and versatile. It provides great coverage and is easy to move in so I can keep walking around if I need to finish something. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Julia M

customer_reviews.title: BEST NURSING COVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!! It’s SO versatile & easy to use! Thin, soft breathable material. Easy to clean - just throw in the laundry. I much prefer this over any other nursing cover for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Supper soft and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this with my baby yet, as I'm still pregnant. I love how soft and lightweight it is. I'm 5'9, 200 lbs and nine months pregnant and this cover has plenty of room when I tried it on now, even with my huge belly. LOL! So I'm sure it will be perfect for when baby arrives. I washed it and it did not shrink so that's always a plus in my book! I wish I could find more colors because I would like a black one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Snipes

customer_reviews.title: Cute pattern but annoying to use
customer_reviews.text: Cute pattern but annoying to use. There seemed to be a lot of fabric and it was cumbersome. Kids don’t always stay still under there and it kept being pulled away. The material was also sorta see through.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great size for plus size Momma
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room. I bought a different brand previously that was too small. This one is an even length all around as well. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a life saver! Good quality, easy to use, looks stylish as a scarf, and easy to throw in my diaper bag. It's lightweight so my son doesn't get too hot but heavy enough that you can't see through it. I've used this to nurse in public more times than I can count.
customer_reviews.author: TR4777

customer_reviews.title: ... a "one size fits all" -it still looks very nice but isn't quite as fitted as the picture depicts
customer_reviews.text: As far as sizing I think it is on the bigger side of a "one size fits all" -it still looks very nice but isn't quite as fitted as the picture depicts. The material is very soft and light and I love that I can wear it as a scarf until I need it as a cover. It's very cute, extremely convenient and well worth the price! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Pros: large, soft, breathable. Cons: ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: large, soft, breathable. Cons: hand wash only, so large that it is almost hard to use, to large to wear stylishly Overall, worth the price, but YouTube a video on how to use it appropriately
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accessory and Cover up!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's very soft material and can be worn in so many ways when not using as a cover up. It takes a little getting use to but other than its perfect to just throw around your neck as an accessory and have a cover up too.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Booth

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like to use it for anything besides the carseat cover. I tried to use it as the scarf one time and it just looked very clumpy. But it is very soft and I like it for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B

customer_reviews.title: Wears well and does its job.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, especially for the price. The material feels thin but it isn’t see through and it does not look too bulky when you wear it as a scarf. It is really stretchy and can cover my 2 month old completely while he’s nursing. I worried about him getting too hot while I am using it but it hasn’t been a problem as of yet. I would definitely recommend to another nursing mom looking for a cover.
customer_reviews.author: A. Furr

customer_reviews.title: Excited to find a product like this for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Excited to find a product like this for a good price, lots of color options as well. It was delivered quickly, the only downfall was that when I received it it had a very strong chemical smell. I had to hand was it twice to get rid of the smell. Both times it was washed the whole sink was filled with dye from the scarf. The scarf did not fade in color after washing.
customer_reviews.author: krista

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the design of most nursing covers
customer_reviews.text: I found this when looking for a nursing cover to try and help making nursing in public easier, I didn't like the design of most nursing covers. I was Slightly skeptical of how this would work when I got but now that I have received it and used I few times I can honestly say I LOVE IT!!!! It is very cute and fashionable when not being used and practical and lightweight so baby doesn't get overly hot while nursing. It is also nice and discrete for nursing in public. I'm seriously considering purchasing another one for when the other is dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: A great nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: A great nursing cover, and I love that's it's just a simple gray. It matches almost any outfit, and doesn't have a pattern to distract my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover!
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought this for me as a gift as I was looking for a versatile nursing cover. I absolutely love it and use it every day, it has made nursing out and about easy and comfortable for both my LO and I. My LO also loves just cuddling in it, it has been one of my most used baby items, so much so I bought a second color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that the material is thin enough to allow air ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that the material is thin enough to allow air flow but still opaque to allow you modesty and privacy. The size is great. I was afraid it would be a bit small as I am a bigger girl, but this covers everything that needs to be covered. I've used it as a shawl and it's wonderful. Won't keep you warm if you experience actual winter but I live in Hawaii and it's good enough to keep the chill out while not making me sweat on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Leesha K

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend! !
customer_reviews.text: I got this product in the mail very quickly i ordered it Saturday night and recieved it Monday morning. Its soft and lightweight even after being washed, it was double stiched on the edges. Its big enough to cover everything and keep your back/sides warm when feeding. You can wear it in different ways. Im thinking of getting a second! Much better than a standard nursing cover that just covers the baby! Only gave it 4 stars because i havent had my baby yet but ive tried other standard covers with my other 2 kids which were ok, but this one im really excited about!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha J.

customer_reviews.title: Dual Purpose Scarf
customer_reviews.text: I love this scarf. I am headed to Disney next week and can't wait to use it. The scarf is light weight and easy to use. I also use this product to just keep warm in the WV winter. I have a love for things that have a dual purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen101

customer_reviews.title: Mom with experience
customer_reviews.text: I have nursed 4 children and have had several nursing covers. This one is great. Folds up nice and small, comfortable Suze to cover myself and baby. Not see through but also not so thick that the baby feels warm.
customer_reviews.author: Ewea

customer_reviews.title: What I was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: This will be very nice for my daughter, due next month. It’s light weight and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: DebS

customer_reviews.title: Good Coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the nursing cover as a gift for my friend who was expecting her 2nd child. She loves the cover! No slips while feeding and she said that the baby doesn't get hot while underneath the cover.
customer_reviews.author: dbutler1410

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for mom and baby!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I could feed my little one while out and about on a family vacation. I didn't really feel comfortable nursing him out in public so this perfect for covering me up. It is big and covered us with ease and the chevron pattern is a nice touch. And the fact that it is a scarf is an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: NOT cotton
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, this is most definitely not made of cotton. It is blended... 95% polyester, 5% spandex. Will be returning. Now that I can see how it's made, though (just a large loop of fabric), someone handy could easily make one themselves.
customer_reviews.author: HJL

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Nursing Scarf
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this nursing scarf for when I have my son who I plan to breastfeed. I was nervous and looked around everywhere because I am a plus size and was afraid it would be too small. After reading reviews i decided to chance it. While my son hasnt been born yet, i tried this on and I am happy to say I think it will fit with him just fine. I am so happy. And when its as a scarf its super cute! Will be using this a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Austyne

customer_reviews.title: The scarf does not drape over me like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The scarf does not drape over me like the picture. It runs smaller than expected, it is not as wide as I'd prefer. Would be nice if it was longer & wide like the picture. I do like that the fabric is breathable.
customer_reviews.author: thehills

customer_reviews.title: Take this thing everywhere wear as an accessory as my ...
customer_reviews.text: Take this thing everywhere wear as an accessory as my baby girl is always with me and when she starts crying whether we are walking in the mall or a store I'm able to cover up and get the job done with some discretion!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica I Owens

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a nice quality nursing scarf
customer_reviews.text: Quality looks good. This item was purchased as a gift for my granddaughter so I’m not sure if durability, ease of cleaning, etc.
customer_reviews.author: laura p

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, nice material
customer_reviews.text: I use this to pump at work in a shared office space. It’s big enough to cover everything even with the flanges underneath. Plus it’s super comfy and very cute— it’ll be a nice accessory even after I’m done pumping.
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is not user friendly for plus size mom's or women with large breasts. I have practiced and tried using this cover but between it being pretty see through and sliding around it doesn't work for me. I would need another hand to hold this cover in place.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was prompt and the product soft and of good quality. I would recommend this product and can ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt and the product soft and of good quality. I would recommend this product and can be counted on as a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: terrie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cover that's Comfy and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover. The scarf is pretty stylish and light weight so you're not burning up. But you can't see through it which is great. It's awesome for when your settled in comfy on the couch with baby and they want to feed but you have company over. You don't have to run off and excuse yourself or search the house for you're cover. It's already there for you and baby.
customer_reviews.author: HiMsP

customer_reviews.title: Pattern is only on one side, otherwise a nice cover
customer_reviews.text: I got the black and white chevron nursing scarf. I love the size and coverage this provides. My main reason for only giving it 3 stars is that the pattern is only on one side. As a nursing cover, that doesn't really matter but it doesn't look as nice when wearing it as an infinity scarf. If you are looking for something to wear all day, I recommend one of the solid colors instead.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki G

customer_reviews.title: good coverage
customer_reviews.text: It's soft, not see through, and does the job for a good price. So many nursing covers aren't big enough for me to feel comfortable nursing in public and they look really obvious. This lets you wear it as a scarf or you can throw it in your purse since it is pretty compact. When in use it isn't glaringly obvious which is nice--and the price is right
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, I never used this product. I opened ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I never used this product. I opened up the envelope and could see my light colored shirt and hand through the material. This is not an option for nursing in public places such as CHURCH, or the library. I had purchased the gray chevron and white pattern, so maybe other patterns will not be see-through. The shipping was fast (I have prime) and the material is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very super soft material
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift chosen from the baby registry. I am sure it was chosen because of how very soft and cuddly the material is and also because of the variety of styles that it can be worn.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: she has very good taste too
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and made very well, but this gift was for my daughter-in-law, she is the one that wanted it, she has very good taste too, but the baby won't be here till March, but I can see her using it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job/wasn't for me personally
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job. My only downfall is my son is just naturally a warm little man so he'd get really hot under this. But it's definitely a nice scarf.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: perfect for covering infant car seat
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would have been a little longer, it's just square and doesn't work too well for me when breastfeeding. It is however, perfect for covering infant car seat.
customer_reviews.author: alvernia242

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product is very handy with my cluster-eating infant. It goes everywhere with us. Although I am not the kind of person who feels I have to hide while breastfeeding, it keeps the kiddos at the park from asking questions, and at the same time keeps my baby warm (or cool), able to breathe, and holds in place on windy days. I am going to try it on my car seat to block the sun next-I don't see why it wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Kinda pricey for what it is, and used it only a handful of times. The ones that are apron like are much easier to use. Style wise it never quite looked right.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Simple but helpful
customer_reviews.text: This product is basically a giant scarf that you can use to breastfeed. I love it because it’s big enough for privacy, but it’s fresh enough to not have my baby sweating up a storm. No need to buy an expensive cover up, this one is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiola Paredes Perez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cover its not super soft but it is soft ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cover its not super soft but it is soft and very well made. It is pretty big too so would fit most any body type and baby :) I would recommend you wash it after you get it, it has a faint smell most likely from packaging and storage but other than that its wonderful. Also very very light weight but not see through looks like it wouldn't be too hot for summer time :)
customer_reviews.author: insertnamehere

customer_reviews.title: quick shipping and does the job to hide nursing and pumping- very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price, quick shipping and does the job to hide nursing and pumping- very happy with my purchase. Nice light weight but not see through material as well- good for FL weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly V.

customer_reviews.title: Very versital
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to wear as a scarf and have it on and ready to use at all times instead of having to look for something to cover yourself with!
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever! I got sooo frustrated one side is ...
customer_reviews.text: Not even what was in the picture ! They simply sent me an infinity scarf! Can not use as breast feeding cover! Dont buy..! Worst ever ! I got sooo frustrated one side is supposed to be smaller to hang over shoulders.. this is just one wise piece of fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Caracol

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe people are making money off of this. It wasn’t even stretchy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of this cover because it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this cover because it does not look like a nursing cover, but I have used it a couple of times and didn't feel like it provided good coverage especially if you are in an area where people are on both sides of you. Overall it's cute, but I would search for a different nursing cover.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy I love the material
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy I love the material. I bought a black and a gray and will probably buy a few more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Ness. E

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice like the extra size and also the fabric is thin and breathable but not so much that you can see thru. This is a gift so I am not able to evaluate any further
customer_reviews.author: G's nanny

customer_reviews.title: Great fast service
customer_reviews.text: Great fast service, product is nice and a comfortable soft material. I just wish it was a little easier while you're trying to latch the baby. You can't see the baby while you try to latch bacause you need to hold the baby so you can't hold the cover as well. I usually have my husband hold it up while I latch so I can see. That or more arms would be great :-)
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Functional and discreet
customer_reviews.text: This cover has been very helpful during the newborn weeks with remaining discreet in public, mostly just draped as a scarf around my neck. However, my little one at 3 months old is now at a stage where he keeps pushing it away though, or wants too look around while feeding. I think any large infinity scarf would function the same way.
customer_reviews.author: O.P.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend and she loved it. She said it was very nice and she really liked the quality a lot.
customer_reviews.author: TameraG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give a baby shower gift that was as much for the mother and this got the bill. It is made of great quality and sophisticated looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Cute and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for covering while breastfeeding. It is light, but you can't see through it. Also, looks cute as a scarf or head covering.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla A

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat cover iffy nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: Great for a car seat cover, more difficult to nurse with. When nursing you can't see what's going on inside and there isn't much side coverage so ppl may be seeing your tummy rolls when that wasn't your goal.
customer_reviews.author: E R Copeland

customer_reviews.title: This is very big and could easily fit someone of most any size
customer_reviews.text: This is very big and could easily fit someone of most any size! I use it for nursing and also turn it into a burp cloth when I'm in public because it covers so much area and reduces the likelyhood of me getting spit up on.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Im a plus size and fits good around me and baby, but not good when its hot. Its also hard to breathe in this. I barely use though. Lets see if for the winter is better.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I really like the functionality of this cover. It's cute and comfortable on it's own worn as a scarf, and can be used as a nursing cover by draping several different ways, and can also be used as a car seat cover. When using it as a nursing cover, I usually end up just draping it across my breast instead of completely covering my little one. The fabric is soft and breathable, and the scarf is wide enough to provide great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely love this scarf because it gives provides me plenty of coverage when I am nursing and it is very nice looking. The only thing I wish is that it had the chevron image on both sides. Overall I am happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jmenic

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: It makes my skin itch, even after multiple washes. The material is rough and umcomfortable. It's not breathable so my baby gets really hot and I get sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Jas

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice item, I got the striped grey/white one and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice item, I got the striped grey/white one and it is the same color on both sides (not white on one side like some reviews said). However I only used it once and didn't find it comfortable for nursing. I ended up just using swaddle muslin blankets - I tie two ends together and put it on my neck. They cover very well and easy to maneuver. Very breathable as well. I will leave that one to wear as a scarf
customer_reviews.author: Elli

customer_reviews.title: Better Scarf than Nursing Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality scarf, and I've worn it as such. However, I would say it isn't the best nursing cover. I find it to be too much fabric and cumbersome. I wanted a nursing cover that could be somewhat discreet (unlike those that kind of look like an apron), but this just hasn't been as practical as I had hoped. However, I am using it as a warm scarf, and it is big enough that I could use it as a nursing cover in a pinch-- it just wouldn't be preferred!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Functional as an adorable infinity scarf which makes it easy to carry around and access easily when needed as a cover. Material is soft. Well worth it for the price. Some reviews mention an ill fit when using it as a cover. I'm 5'10" and 165lbs and it covers me well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can wear it as a scarf to ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get a chance to use it much but it's so big that I was worried about it falling off as I was nursing. I love that you can wear it as a scarf to always have it handy when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for me and my little one. I wear it around my neck or slip it into my purse and it works better than a blanket for us. I love that it wraps around me so that he can't kick it up quite so easily.
customer_reviews.author: 3awsomeboys

customer_reviews.title: Drapes really well and seems to be well made. ...
customer_reviews.text: Drapes really well and seems to be well made. I have to get used to how large the opening is- my other one is more secure around my neck with boning to allow me to adjust and watch baby nurse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kiddo Care Nursing Cover Infinity Nursing Scarf for Breastfeeding (Elegant Grey)

❤ Bonus Ebooks on Breastfeeding and Baby Showers (sent by email) and many many more bonuses coming up !

❤ This is the perfect gift for any occasion; Baby showers, Birthdays, Thanksgiving, Anniversary, and any other occasion, this will serve as a best gift to give to an expecting mother, a mother with breastfeeding kids, Daughters and even teenagers who are in love with fashion. THE PERFECT CHOICE for PERFECT PEOPLE!
